page.title: 16OUR TAUNTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school,Lyngford Park County Primary,was built fifteen years ago.It is in the middle of a housing estate. The age range is from 5_11 and there are 250 children.The school has a headmistress,eight teachers and two school assistants.A few parents come in to help with practical activities. The school is built in four separate, one_storey blocks around a courtyard. We have two tarmac playgrounds and a large playing field.Parents helped to raise the money to build a covered, unheated swimming pool. We are at school from 9.00am to 3.30pm,forty weeks of the year.We use television,videos,tape recorders and computers to help with our lessons. We think we come to school to learn to read,write,do sums and get on with other people. School's pretty good on the whole.
